GATHERING_QUESTIONS: I tend to be hard on myself when I don't meet my own high expectations.
I prefer a predictable, steady routine over spontaneity and variety.
I need to understand the logical reason behind a rule before I will follow it.
I am more likely to finish a task if I know someone else is watching or counting on me.
I often feel overwhelmed when I have too many choices to make.
I find it difficult to stick with a task if I don't see immediate results.
When I get stressed or busy, my personal habits are the first thing I drop.
I am motivated by competition and proving I am better than others.
I often make plans but struggle to actually start them.
I believe that if I work hard enough, I can change almost anything about myself.
